author: Michael Cook
comment: Thank you so much for this!   It works good so far, it's really nice to have the file explorer ability right on my Gear Live,  this watch keeps getting better and better, a lot due to developers like you, I am looking forward to the music player!  I will edit this with any observations or issues as needed.
title: Awesome File Explorer for Wear!

author: Spencer McClendon
comment: I can't open the SD card on my LG G Watch. Tried un-rooted as well as rooted.
title: Doesn't work!
